definitions: a small, sap-sucking scale insect that is coated with a white, powdery wax that resembles meal. It forms large colonies and can be a serious pest, especially in greenhouses.

notes.text: Family Pseudococcidae, suborder Homoptera: Pseudococcus and other genera

shortDefinitions: small sap-sucking scale insect which is coated with white powdery wax resembling meal and which can be serious pest
